description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Memoirs of a Captivity among the Indians of North America, from childhood to the age of nineteen, with anecdotes descriptive of their manners and customs. To which is added, some account of the soil, climate and vegetable productions, of the territory westward of the Mississippi.]" Author: HUNTER, John Dunn. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1431.h.16." Page: 6 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1824 Edition: Third edition, with additions. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001771927 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
